snippet: Tottenham has quietly moved up to third in the Premier League, and can tie Manchester United for second place by winning a makeup game against Everton on Wednesday.
abstract: Tottenham has quietly moved up to third in the Premier League, and can tie Manchester United for second place by winning a makeup game against Everton on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Rob Hughes writes Tuesday about Tottenham's quiet rise to third place in the Premier League in a season that began with the riots near its home stadium. The disturbances forced the postponement of Tottenham's opener against Everton, and its Premier League schedule began instead with consecutive losses to Manchester United and Manchester City.

headline.main: Tottenham Works Its Way Back to the Top
